text.autoconfig.screencopy.title: Screencopy
text.autoconfig.screencopy.option.saveSc: Save screenshots to file aside from copying to clipboard
text.autoconfig.screencopy.option.messag: Sends a message everytime the screenshot is sent to clipboard, config ignored in some obvious cases
fml.menu.mods.info.description.screencop: Let's you save screenshots to your clipboard
